snippet: In 2007, the distributor of 5-Hour Energy conducted a study of energy drinks. It was never published, but its findings and other details about it emerged during a 2008 lawsuit.
lead_paragraph: In 2007, the distributor of 5-Hour Energy conducted a study of energy drinks. It was never published, but its findings and other details about it emerged during a 2008 lawsuit.

headline.seo: Study From the Distributors of 5-Hour Energy
